mapper.select: SELECT /* PeriodMapper.getAllPeriods */ period_id, start_date, end_date, total FROM period
SELECT /* PeriodMapper.getPeriodById */ period_id, start_date, end_date, total FROM period WHERE period_id = #{id}
SELECT /* PeriodMapper.getCurrentPeriod */ period_id, start_date, end_date, total FROM period WHERE start_date <= CURDATE() AND end_date >= CURDATE() LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* PeriodMapper.createPeriod */ period (start_date, end_date, total) VALUES ( #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{total} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* PeriodMapper.updatePeriod */ period SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, total = #{total} WHERE period_id = #{periodId}
